item.title: Storyset: Free Illustrations Animator
item.description:
Product Highlights

Perfect for teams grinding on presentations, apps, or social content. And hey, it’s free. Seriously, why pay for stock art when you can play here?

item.title: Animata: Plug-and-Play React Animations
item.description:
Product Highlights

Stumbled upon Animata while rushing a client project and damn, it’s like finding a secret weapon. Picture this: you need to add fluid animations to your React app but don’t want to wrestle with CSS keyframes for hours. Here, 80+ components are ready to copy-paste, with slick effects like border trails and typing text that just work out of the box. Tried the mirror text component—three lines of code and my landing page went from bland to wow. They’re open source and free, despite the team logging over 1k dev hours. Perfect for indie devs shipping fast or teams avoiding animation debt. Feels like having a design agency in your node_modules.

Pricing Model

item.title: Animate UI: Copy-Paste Motion Magic
item.description:

Open-source and free, it plays nice with Shadcn UI like peanut butter and jelly. Toss a fireworks background with typewriter text effects and boom - you’ve got a pro landing page in minutes. Perfect for indie devs who want to impress clients without breaking the bank.

item.title: Kurzgesagt: Animated Science Digest
item.description:
Product Highlights
